title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XI, pt. 3000 - Tax Appeals Tribunal Rules Of Practice And Procedure
content:

§ 3000.1 - Definitions
§ 3000.2 - Representation
§ 3000.3 - Commencement of proceedings
§ 3000.4 - Pleadings; amended pleadings
§ 3000.5 - Motion practice
§ 3000.6 - Bill of particulars; admissions; depositions; disclosure prior to a licensing hearing
§ 3000.7 - Subpoenas
§ 3000.8 - Recusal
§ 3000.9 - Accelerated determination
§ 3000.10 - Ex parte communications
§ 3000.11 - Stipulations for hearing
§ 3000.12 - Submission without hearing
§ 3000.13 - Small claims hearings

§ 3000.16 - Motions to reopen record or for reargument
§ 3000.17 - Review by tribunal
§ 3000.18 - Expedited hearings
§ 3000.19 - Record of hearing
§ 3000.20 - Judicial review
§ 3000.21 - Frivolous petitions

§ 3000.23 - Miscellaneous provisions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XI, pt. 3000

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§2006, 2012, 2014, 2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
